amendatorysection.bookinfo: Uniform Commercial Code, Revised Statutes Cumulative Supplement, 2018
amendatorysection.para: A security interest that is an unperfected security interest immediately before July 1, 2013, becomes a perfected security interest:
(1) without further action, on July 1, 2013, if the applicable requirements for perfection under this article as it existed on July 1, 2013, are satisfied before or at that time; or
(2) when the applicable requirements for perfection are satisfied if the requirements are satisfied after that time.
